Containers.Name: Axigen Mail Server with AntiSpam
Containers.Overview: Axigen Mail Server with SpamAssassin and ClamAV, Please read https://github.com/SiwatINC/axigen-antispam first! The free licence allow you to have 5 users accross 5 domains
